# Civilian
Civilian jobs are those of [color=#a4885c]service[/color], and can include anything from [color=#a4885c]janitorial work[/color] to [color=#a4885c]lawyering[/color], being a simple [color=#a4885c]passenger[/color] or even the station's very own [color=#a4885c]clown[/color].
\n These are usually a great fit for anyone looking to [color=#a4885c]learn the ropes[/color], or just kick back and relax, as some of these provide unique opportunites for [color=#a4885c]roleplay[/color].
